title: A new website and font from MADType
content:
I'm posting to let you fellow font fiends know about my updated website.  
I've made it much easier to navigate and made much larger showings of all of my fonts.

So have a look and also check out my latest font, Zapatista.

[http://www.madtype.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012064406/http:/www.madtype.net/ "http://www.madtype.net")

Regards,  
Matt
author: matthew_desmond
